name: Statistical Analyst (Data Analyst)
description:
Do you want to be a part of a dynamic team that will challenge your analytical, problem-solving and communication skills? Are you interested in working in the company with qualified team members and state-of-the-art processes paired with experienced management?

There is a fantastic opportunity to join HiQo Solutions as a Statistical Analyst! You'll be working with our client, who successfully uses data to prevent construction accidents and injuries at work. So you will get a chance to save lives with mathematics, for real!

Required skills and knowledge:

  • Good knowledge of Python
  • Understanding of regression, classification and clusterization algorithms
  • Experience in time series analysis
  • Experience in gradient boosting
  • Knowledge of Python libraries such as pandas, numpy, sklearn, xgboost, lightgbm, prophet, matplotlib, plotly

We offer you:

  • Possibility to work remotely
  • Competitive salary based on the results of the interview
  • Flexible schedule
  • Interesting projects for international customers
  • Wide range of social benefits and various team building events (bowling, mafia, board games, movie nights, quests, – quizzes and many more)
  • Great opportunity to take part in cutting edge areas like mathematical data processing and IoT
  • And above all – friendly and committed team of colleagues!
